channel.title: Soulful Living Sessions with DJ OMAR
channel.description: The deeper side of soulful house music. A weekly radio show presenting an eclectic mix of deep house, nu-jazz, downtempo, and afro-rhythms compiled and mixed by DJ OMAR.

image.title: Soulful Living Sessions with DJ OMAR

item.title: Show 009
item.description: 1. MUSTAFA FEATURING BIA PONTES/RIO DE JANEIRO 2. MUSTAFA FEATURING FLEXIE MUISO/LET IT RAIN (EZEL MIX) 3. HIDEO KOBAYASHI/LISTEN TO THE VOICE 4. JAY TRIPWIRE/DETROIT INSPIRES ME 5. HIDEO KOBAYASHI/ROCKSTAR (STUDIO APARTMENT MIX) 6. FUNKY SOLDIERS & IN 2 DEEP FT. JELONE/DID YOU EVER 7. TORTURED SOUL/ANOTHER LOVER 8. AARON ROSS FEATURING NATASHA WATTS/TIME TO SHINE (MUTHAFUNKAZ REMIX) 9. KAJE/BUTTERFLIES (MR. V REMIX) 10. MR. V FEATURING STUDIO APARTMENT/I WANT YOU TO MOVE 11. DENNIS FERRER/SANDCASTLES 12. HIDEO KOBAYASHI/YOU LIFT ME UP 13. LIBBY/BURNING BRIDGES (MR. V MIX)

item.title: Show 008
item.description: 1. CLARA HILL MEETS ATJAZZ/NOWHERE (I CAN GO) 2. MELLOW MADNESS/NOW YOU'RE CALLING (FOR LOVE DUB) 3. SOLAN/ESSENCE (AKI BERGEN MIX) 4. YASS/ALL I'M ASKING FOR (DUB) 5.
